I knew you'd come.
Yes. Climb up there, and catch my rope, please.
You have to get me out of here.
Josh?
Come on. Josh. Lyle.
Lyle.
Lyle.
Help me. Help me.
Lyle.
No, no, no.
Josh?
You have to talk to him. Tell him to help me.

translation.en: It's not me that has to talk to him, Hector.
It's you.
But...
I-I realize I may not have always acted in the best way possible, Lyle.
translation.ko: 늘 좋은 모습만 보여준 건 아니지만

translation.en: But I showed you the world.
I introduced you to white truffle oil.
I taught you the moonwalk.
Okay, fine, fine.
I apologize. My behavior was unforgivable.
I used you, and I abandoned you.
And it's my fault you're here.
But, please, come back with me.
Come back to where you belong.
Back to...
Back to Josh.
And the Primms.
To your family.
We gotta get you out of here.
Tell me the second part of your plan is better.

translation.en: Not better. It's perfect.
I've got Evangelyne parked up by the gates.
We can outrun anyone on her.
But Lyle can't just keep running.
Of course he can. You'd be amazed what you can outrun.

translation.en: Ex-wives. OFFICER: Hands up.

No, no, this is not a life.

translation.en: We have to show people what Lyle can do.
That they don't have to be scared of him.
We gotta show them...
Go, take Lyle. I've got this.

Copy.

Lyle.

entering the Theater District.

What's he doing in Times Square?
JOSH: Hey, hey.
I'm on the steps.
Yeah, I need your help. Where is it?
Yeah, I'm at the backstage door.
What are you doing here?
Yes, and we need to show people what he can do.
We need your help.
Trudy.
Follow me.
Whoa, hey.

Yet another unbelievable performance.
Remember to text your vote to the long number on the bottom of your screens.

oh, boy, are...

Oh, you're just impressed because it was a crocodile.

translation.en: It was still broken out of the zoo.

translation.ko: 우리 시 규정의 그 어느 조항을 봐도

translation.ko: 악어는 거주 지역에 있을 수 없습니다

I'm afraid the plaintiff is right.
HECTOR: But who wants to be merely right
when you can be fabulously triumphant instead?
translation.ko: 훨씬 더 큰 승리를 거둘 수 있는데

translation.en: Good morning, Your Honor. Excuse me.
I have some documents here that were stolen from me
which are of vital importance to this case.
What documents? The original deeds
translation.ko: 어떤 문서입니까? 이스트 88번가 저택의 권리증 원본입니다

translation.en: to the house on East 88th Street.
How'd you get those? Those were under my bed.

translation.en: I was led to them by a new friend. Meow.
Why?
Let me see that. Of course.
Those papers date from the time of my maternal grandmother,
Evelyn T. Valenti.
Not just the woman who built the house on East 88th Street,
but the woman who was the founder of the New York Zoo.
GRUMPS: This is nonsense. What?
This is a special deed granted by the City of New York.
In acknowledgment to my grandmother's contributions
to the city, and to accommodate her fascination for the animals.
